name: CDSHooksExtensions
title: CDSHooks Services Extensions
description: This is a concrete subtype of Base that has extensions (though the format in JSON is different)

element.short: Object that has Named Extension Properties
element.definition: A JSON object that has properties where the names are defined by the extension definitions
element.comment: Extension structures SHOULD use a strategy for naming that ensures global uniqueness, such as reverse-domain-name notation, e.g. com.cds-hooks.sandbox.myextension-practitionerspecialty. How to handle complex extensions (objects) is not defined

element.definition: An extension where the name is defined by the extension definition, and the extension definition is of any type (including primitives, though the 'id' element cannot be represented for primitives)

element.comment: Extension structures SHOULD use a strategy for naming that ensures global uniqueness, such as reverse-domain-name notation, e.g. com.cds-hooks.sandbox.myextension-practitionerspecialty. How to handle complex extensions (objects) is not defined
